contentfulProduct.seoDescription: The super soft quilt set you've always dreamed of. Our mid-weight bamboo quilt set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Bamboo Lyocell Quilt Set

content.value: The super soft quilt set you've always dreamed of. Our mid-weight bamboo quilt set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties - perfect for year-round comfort. Set includes quilt and two shams.
Set includes quilt and two shams
Twin and Full/Queen include standard shams, King/Cal King includes king shams
Shell crafted of 100% organic bamboo
Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester for ultimate loft
Breathable, yet insulating; best for year-round comfort
Hypoallergenic - ideal for allergen sensitive sleepers
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Made with care in China

Machine wash cold on delicate with like fabrics, tumble dry low.  Avoid bleach. To prevent pilling, avoid fabric softener or dryer balls. To avoid wrinkles, remove immediately after drying. Iron on low if desired.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Set includes quilt and two shams
  • Twin and Full/Queen include standard shams, King/Cal King includes king shams
  • Shell crafted of 100% organic bamboo
  • Filled with 180-gsm of 100% recycled polyester for ultimate loft
  • Breathable, yet insulating; best for year-round comfort
  • Hypoallergenic - ideal for allergen sensitive sleepers
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Made with care in China

productDescription.productDescription: The super soft quilt set you've always dreamed of. Our mid-weight bamboo quilt set is crafted from 100% organic bamboo which is one of the planet's most resource-efficient materials. The fine bamboo fibers are spun into a luxuriously soft and silky smooth sateen weave with temperature regulating properties - perfect for year-round comfort. Set includes quilt and two shams.
